items.title: Controlled trading with options after rise: Shubham Agarwal
items.description: Closing time option premium is often discounting the loss of premium due to passage of a day, Hence, it would be a little less expensive. Now, the Future with stop loss is Future with protection. This way in case if during the night hours something horrible happens, we do not get crushed

items.title: Market posts biggest weekly gains since Feb 2021; rupee appreciates
items.description: All the sectoral indices ended in positive territory with Nifty Realty and Private Bank indices surged 7 percent each, Nifty Bank index added 6.4 percent, Nifty PSU Bank index rose 5.6 percent, Nifty Media index jumped 5 percent and Nifty Oil & Gas and Auto indices were up 4 percent each.
